home.name: < Eduardo Martino />
home.description_part2: , I transform ideas into digital experiences! I develop modern websites with optimized and engaging interfaces.

about.title: About Me
about.p1: Hi! I'm Eduardo, a fullstack developer deeply passionate about technology. I'm currently studying Computer Science at PUC Minas, a journey that allows me to dive daily into the challenges and innovations driving the digital world.
about.p2: My specialty is fullstack development. I have solid knowledge and projects creating complete solutions, from building dynamic and responsive user interfaces with React, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, to developing efficient back-ends with the .NET platform. Git is a constant tool in my workflow, ensuring integrity and collaboration in every project.
about.p3: Beyond code, I'm a big enthusiast of games, series, movies, and music. I believe that immersing myself in good stories and different art forms fuels my creativity and my ability to think "outside the box" to solve problems.

skills.title: Skills
skills.problemSolvingDesc: Focus on finding efficient and creative solutions.
skills.teamworkDesc: Collaborative, proactive, and open to feedback.
skills.agileDesc: Experience in processes like Scrum and Kanban.
